name: The Mighty More
description:
Play as Less, who is secretly a super hero! Less must fight off an invading force and get back in time to get his girlfriend a Valentines' day present, or things could get rough. Can you get all four different endings?

This is my entry to my first game jam, the Black Thorn Game Jam 3. The theme was "Less is more". I tried to incorporate the theme in my character destine, color palate, scoring, and time it takes to beat. I guess you could say I took that approach to my sound design too, but I really just ran out of time. 

Controls: Arrow keys to move/navigate menus, space bar to shoot/interact

Let me know what score you got in the comments!
